alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 20 at 3:31PM EST until February 21 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following river in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Flooding threatens low lying roads and structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.8 feet Saturday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 6 am EST Tuesday.
